## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G03475](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G03475)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCPO-I, HEMF1, LIN2</u>
- **Gene Name:** LESION INITIATION 2
- **Description:**   Coproporphyrinogen III oxidase;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2825062
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [lin2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Plant have pale green leaves and develop lesions on the young leaves.  Lesions begin as a small spot or stripe of collapsed tissue usually appearing in the middle part of the young leaves.
